attributes.action: Recommend Professor Christopher Whitty to be Sir Christopher Whitty
attributes.additional_details: Professor Witty has taken us through this pandemic in an exemplary manner, with the calmness necessary in these unprecedented times
attributes.background: Parliament to recommend to all ministers to propose Professor Chris Whitty to the most excellent Order of the British Empire

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
